freebase base
%mass 1
%inertia 1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1
%point p0
rigidbody b0 _ _ _  _ _ _  1  1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1
rotjoint j0 1 0 0
%mass 1
%inertia 1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1
%point p1
rigidbody b1 _ _ _  _ _ _  1  1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1

endmodel
